Blog.post: wah..todae go watch movie...twins effect 2..damn nice lor...very funny also..haha..then hor...dunno y lar..EK just go andlor...then i at there dunno wat to do sia...then 3/4 of the show...i let go...dunno y...lucky nobody see lor...then after the show...me evi enkai go home early...then kailim tell me after that he saw mr foo!!!!haha...lucky i go home first sia...hahaha...mr foo will sure mention infront of the whole class lor...wahahas...oh ya..todae before i go to watch movie...me jian teck drick tim kim and him stay back after the oral...then he now like towards me okay already lor...we all eberytime like sumtimes okay..sumtimes NEVER talk at all...dunno lar...hope he could change to becum like last time...cos..everyone prefers the old him..and i dun think i noe the new him..haiz....then now he sort of becum quite "dirty minded"....haiz....million tears cried fer yew....

haiz...today school end at five again..tiring lor...sian..then todae got math teach..face tat ba zhang again..wahas..then after tat we do the test lor...then after tat we go through..then mrs soh very funni sia..haha...can laugh ur head out sia..haha..lame lor..then when wan to go home tat time..6harmony go first mah..cos we dun wanna listen to the explanation but 6humility wans..then mrs soh sae 1 minute she wan to see us all out..wah..then we all faster pack sia..but like none of all us really put the things inside our bag..we just take and chiong ar!!!haha..damn funni la..hahas...=)still got one more thing i forgot to tell u..todae i almost cry sia..dunno why..cos me and him at the 45 minutes break were sitting quite close la..then i see him lor..then i think he really totally change lor..sadz..only one thing he never change..and tat thing will never be changed..he's such a filrt..he filrts around with every single gurl!!i already told myself a hunded times..a thousand times..a million times tat he deserved "IT" but i dunno why..i had tis feeling tat i have blame the wrong person..if that night i had sms to him nicely and not jus said those words..things couldn't be like this..he couldn't be like this and i couldn't be like this..haiz..full of regrets...maybe it wasn't him..maybe he is playing a prank.....millions of excuses for him..but the first thing i replied was harsh..i didn't really mean it...im so sorry..if "u" have read this..i wan u to noe tat i was jus saying those words that night in a fit of anger..IM SO SORRY!!!million tears cried fer yew..=(

yoz..wah todae go buy the rabbit with jian teck evi and hao...wah...grey colour wan...so cute sia..!!hehe..then hao pay lor..then he donate to the school...then we every wednesday can go play with the rabbits liao...good!!kekez...hoping to see baby rabbits..!!wahahas...=)b

todae psle oral...i take chinese first...then the passage was okay..but the picture sux like hell lor..half the road half the shops..kaoz..how to sae..i dun even noe where is it lor..then when i tok i stop here stop there...kaoz eh...sure fail wan lar...scare sia=X......

wah!!todae sux like hell..school ends at 5!!kaoz...i wanna kill the teacher..every time scold us..then also keep on insulting us...treat us as their dogs ar??!!fuk la...then that mr zad keep on talking shit...at there onli waste time cuz nobody listening sia...wahahas...then i very tired lor...whole dae like occupied by the school...no freedom sia...sadz..haix..then i todae saw him again..walk past him again..but as usual..we treat each other as stranger again..haiz..*sobz*..why we become like this??really dunno wat had happened to us..really hope we can be like last time...*sob sob*...million tears cried fer yew ...
